info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 5:31PM MDT until June 07 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... West central Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 531 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Maes, or 20 miles southeast of Wagon Mound, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Solano. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
